Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-45338 affecting package influxdb for versions less than 2.6.1-19
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-45338 affecting package influxdb for versions less than 2.6.1-19. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package influxdb is earlier than 2.6.1-19, affected by CVE-2024-45338
